name: Tower Defense (LTHC The Master)
description:
Controls:

  Z/Q/S/D // W/A/S/D : Controls of camera
 Mouse wheel : Controls of camera
 C and M : controls of camera
 P and Escape : Pause menu
 L : Generate Game Over menu

Tower Defense is game in which you have to survive to a few waves with the help of towers.

Some secret key combining can allow yu to have Tesla tower, unlock all levels instantly and acces to a secret infos menu.
